io.ichi_go.ichigo

Class ExpandableListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • io.ichi_go.ichigo.ExpandableListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList

    public class ExpandableListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
    Adapter used to set up the expandable list in the channel drawer
